name: Fimbulwinter
description:
A project for the TPD4168 - game design course at NTNU.

"You arrive at a strange island and find yourself in a ruined viking village with no memory of what has happened. Use your throwing axe as a movable platform to traverse dangerous terrain and uncover the truth in this gloomy puzzle-platformer!"

This is our first experience with making a game from scratch :)

(Current speedrun record: 4min 50 sec by Sigmund. Time starts when you press play, and ends when the final cutscene starts. Good luck!)

Made by:

Sigmund William Cook

Alexander Polanco Olsen

Frederik Piché

Markus Leander Vågran
